achievements.name: Getting Started
achievements.description: Place your first bet on any match and kick off your betting adventure!

achievements.name: First Victory
achievements.description: Win your first bet and celebrate with a triumphant start.

achievements.name: Regular Bettor
achievements.description: Place a total of 50 bets and earn recognition as a regular player.

achievements.name: Consistent Winner
achievements.description: Win 50 bets total and prove your prediction skills.

achievements.name: Heating Up
achievements.description: Win 3 bets in a row and feel the momentum building!

achievements.name: Against The Odds
achievements.description: Win a bet on a team with odds of 3.0 or higher—defy the odds!

achievements.name: Seasoned Veteran
achievements.description: Place 500 bets total and claim your veteran status.

achievements.name: Master Predictor
achievements.description: Win 250 bets and showcase your mastery of predictions.

achievements.name: High Roller
achievements.description: Win a single bet with a payout over 10,000 coins—big wins await!

achievements.name: On Fire!
achievements.description: Win 7 bets in a row and ignite your winning streak.

achievements.name: Community Pillar
achievements.description: Participate in 10 different community-created bet pools and support the community.

achievements.name: Legendary Seer
achievements.description: Win 1,000 bets total and ascend as a legendary predictor.

achievements.name: All In
achievements.description: Place a single bet of 50,000 coins or more—go big or go home!

achievements.name: Unstoppable
achievements.description: Win 15 bets in a row and become truly unstoppable.

achievements.name: EquipGG Fixture
achievements.description: Place 2,500 bets total and cement your place in EquipGG history.

achievements.name: Pocket Money
achievements.description: Accumulate a total of 10,000 coins and start building your fortune.

achievements.name: First Sale
achievements.description: Sell an item back to the shop for your first profitable trade.

achievements.name: Unboxer
achievements.description: Open your first crate and discover the thrill of unboxing.

achievements.name: Perkaholic
achievements.description: Buy any perk from the shop and enhance your gameplay.

achievements.name: Well Off
achievements.description: Accumulate a total of 100,000 coins and enjoy your wealth.

achievements.name: Contractor
achievements.description: Complete your first Trade-Up Contract and unlock crafting rewards.

achievements.name: Collector
achievements.description: Own 5 different "Rare" quality items at the same time—build your collection!

achievements.name: Crate Connoisseur
achievements.description: Open 50 crates and become a crate-opening expert.

achievements.name: Master Crafter
achievements.description: Complete 10 Trade-Up Contracts and master the art of crafting.

achievements.name: Jackpot!
achievements.description: Unbox a Legendary item from a crate and hit the jackpot!

achievements.name: Millionaire
achievements.description: Accumulate a total of 1,000,000 coins and join the millionaire's club.

achievements.name: Flipper
achievements.description: Sell 50 items back to the shop and perfect your trading skills.

achievements.name: The Duo
achievements.description: Own a Knife and a pair of Gloves at the same time—style and power combined!

achievements.name: Tycoon
achievements.description: Accumulate a total of 10,000,000 coins and rise as a tycoon.

achievements.name: Getting Serious
achievements.description: Reach Level 10 and show you're committed to the grind.

achievements.name: Daily Grind
achievements.description: Complete 10 Daily Missions and build your daily routine.

achievements.name: Quarter Century Club
achievements.description: Reach Level 25 and join the elite quarter-century club!

achievements.name: Mission Accomplished
achievements.description: Complete 5 Main Missions and start your epic campaign.

achievements.name: Halfway There
achievements.description: Reach Level 50 and celebrate being halfway to the top!

achievements.name: Loyalist
achievements.description: Log in 7 days in a row and prove your loyalty.

achievements.name: Elite
achievements.description: Reach Level 75 and claim your elite status.

achievements.name: The Pinnacle
achievements.description: Reach Level 100 and stand at the peak of progression.

achievements.name: Habitual
achievements.description: Log in 30 days in a row and make it a habit!

achievements.name: Completionist
achievements.description: Complete all 50 Main Missions and become a true completionist.

achievements.name: A New Beginning
achievements.description: Achieve Prestige 1 and start a new chapter of greatness.

achievements.name: Ascended
achievements.description: Achieve Prestige 5 and ascend to the highest ranks!

achievements.name: Voice in the Crowd
achievements.description: Make your first post on the forums and join the conversation.

achievements.name: Interior Decorator
achievements.description: Customize your profile showcase for the first time and add your flair.

achievements.name: Contributor
achievements.description: Make 25 posts on the forums and become a valued contributor.

achievements.name: Socialite
achievements.description: Successfully refer a friend who reaches Level 10 and grow the community.

achievements.name: Weekly Top 10
achievements.description: Finish in the Top 10 on the weekly leaderboard and shine!

achievements.name: Forum Veteran
achievements.description: Make 100 posts on the forums and earn veteran status.

achievements.name: Historian
achievements.description: Get 100 wins on a single StatTrak™ item and record your legacy.

achievements.name: Taste Tester
achievements.description: Buy at least one of every type of perk from the shop—try them all!

achievements.name: Fully Decorated
achievements.description: Unlock and fill every slot in the Veteran profile showcase—total customization!

achievements.name: First Bet
achievements.description: Place your first bet on any match

achievements.name: Lucky Streak
achievements.description: Win 5 bets in a row

achievements.name: High Roller
achievements.description: Place a bet worth 1000+ coins

achievements.name: First Win
achievements.description: Win your first game

achievements.name: Game Master
achievements.description: Play 100 games

achievements.name: Lucky Number
achievements.description: Win with a 7x multiplier

achievements.name: Welcome
achievements.description: Complete your profile setup

achievements.name: Chatty
achievements.description: Send 100 chat messages

achievements.name: Mentor
achievements.description: Refer 5 friends to EquipGG

achievements.name: Collector
achievements.description: Own 10 different items

achievements.name: Rare Hunter
achievements.description: Own 3 rare or higher items

achievements.name: Legendary Owner
achievements.description: Own a legendary item

achievements.name: Daily Player
achievements.description: Log in 7 days in a row

achievements.name: Dedicated
achievements.description: Log in 30 days in a row

achievements.name: Early Adopter
achievements.description: Joined EquipGG in the first month

achievements.name: Beta Tester
achievements.description: Participated in the beta testing

missions.name: Daily Login
missions.description: Log in to EquipGG and start your day right with a quick XP boost.

missions.name: Place a Bet
missions.description: Make a prediction on any match and earn XP for your participation.

missions.name: Win a Bet
missions.description: Successfully predict a match outcome and claim your XP reward.

missions.name: Open a Crate
missions.description: Unbox a Crate and discover new items while earning XP.

missions.name: Complete Trade-Up
missions.description: Use the Trade-Up Contract system and earn XP for your crafting.

missions.name: Forum Activity
missions.description: Make a post or comment on the forums and engage with the community.

missions.name: Vote in Community
missions.description: Cast a vote in community polls and earn XP for your opinion.

missions.name: Check Leaderboard
missions.description: Visit the leaderboard to see your ranking and earn a small XP boost.

missions.name: Customize Profile
missions.description: Update your profile showcase and earn XP for personalization.

missions.name: The First Step
missions.description: Take your first bet and step into the world of predictions.

missions.name: A Winner is You
missions.description: Win your very first bet and taste victory.

missions.name: Join the Conversation
missions.description: Cast your first community vote and make your voice heard.

missions.name: Getting Paid
missions.description: Earn your first 1,000 Coins and start building wealth.

missions.name: Moving Up
missions.description: Reach Level 5 and show your early dedication.

missions.name: What's in the Box?
missions.description: Open your first Crate and discover the thrill of unboxing.

missions.name: Gear Up
missions.description: Equip your first item to your profile and show off your style.

missions.name: Liquidate Assets
missions.description: Sell an item back to the shop for the first time.

missions.name: Sizing Up Competition
missions.description: Check out the leaderboard to see where you stand.

missions.name: Speak Your Mind
missions.description: Make your first forum post and join the community discussion.

missions.name: Active Bettor
missions.description: Place 25 bets and prove your dedication.

missions.name: Novice Predictor
missions.description: Win 10 bets and hone your prediction skills.

missions.name: Climbing the Ladder
missions.description: Reach Level 25 and celebrate your milestone.

missions.name: Building a Bank
missions.description: Accumulate 25,000 Coins and unlock a rewarding bonus.

missions.name: Daily Dedication
missions.description: Complete 20 Daily Missions and show consistent effort.

missions.name: The Comeback
missions.description: Win a bet on a team with odds of 2.5 or higher.

missions.name: Hot Streak
missions.description: Win 3 bets in a row and claim your streak bonus.

missions.name: Crate Opener
missions.description: Open 10 Crates and build your collection.

missions.name: Armory Started
missions.description: Own 5 different skins and grow your arsenal.

missions.name: The Alchemist
missions.description: Complete your first Trade-Up Contract.

missions.name: Power Up
missions.description: Purchase a perk from the shop and enhance your gameplay.

missions.name: Opinionated
missions.description: Cast 50 community votes and show active participation.

missions.name: Show Off
missions.description: Customize your profile showcase.

missions.name: Community Member
missions.description: Make 10 forum posts and engage with the community.

missions.name: The Recruiter
missions.description: Successfully refer a friend and grow the community.

missions.name: Serious Bettor
missions.description: Place 100 bets and show your commitment.

missions.name: Skilled Predictor
missions.description: Win 50 bets and master your prediction skills.

missions.name: Half-Century
missions.description: Reach Level 50 and celebrate this major milestone.

missions.name: Getting Rich
missions.description: Accumulate 100,000 Coins and unlock impressive bonuses.

missions.name: Unstoppable Force
missions.description: Win 5 bets in a row and earn a big streak reward.

missions.name: Rare Collector
missions.description: Own a Rare quality item or higher.

missions.name: Trade Master
missions.description: Complete 10 Trade-Up Contracts and show crafting expertise.

missions.name: Historian in the Making
missions.description: Get 100 wins on a single StatTrak™ item.

missions.name: Big Spender
missions.description: Spend 50,000 Coins in the shop.

missions.name: Weekly Contender
missions.description: Finish in the Top 100 on the weekly leaderboard.

missions.name: Epic Collector
missions.description: Own an Epic quality item or higher.

missions.name: Daily Expert
missions.description: Complete 75 Daily Missions and show dedication.

missions.name: Forum Regular
missions.description: Make 50 forum posts and be an active community member.

missions.name: Well-Equipped
missions.description: Fill 20 inventory slots with your arsenal.

missions.name: Elite Status
missions.description: Reach Level 75 and celebrate with massive rewards.

missions.name: Betting Machine
missions.description: Place 1,000 bets and show your betting prowess.

missions.name: Grandmaster Predictor
missions.description: Win 500 bets and claim epic prediction mastery.

missions.name: Max Level
missions.description: Reach Level 100 and unlock the ultimate reward!

missions.name: Coin Baron
missions.description: Accumulate 1,000,000 Coins and earn prestigious status.

missions.name: Impossible Streak
missions.description: Win 10 bets in a row and claim legendary rewards.

missions.name: The Collector

missions.description: Complete 250 Daily Missions and gain impressive rewards.

missions.name: Legendary Collector

crates.name: Level Up Crate
crates.description: A standard crate awarded every time you level up, packed with a random item to boost your collection.

crates.name: Weekly Loyalty Crate
crates.description: A special crate earned after a 7-day login streak, offering a much higher chance for rare and exciting items.

crates.name: Prestige Crate
crates.description: An elite crate unlocked only upon achieving Prestige, guaranteeing a high-tier item to showcase your mastery.

crates.name: Trade-Up Crate
crates.description: A crate received after a successful Trade-Up Contract, filled with better-than-average items to elevate your arsenal.

crates.name: Summer 2025 Crate
crates.description: A limited-time crate available during the Summer 2025 event, featuring exclusive items to celebrate the season.
